statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 3 , 3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + x + 4 , -27 \, x^{3} - 18 \, x^{2} - 9 \, x - 36 , -9 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 12 , x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
